meanings: [명사] escape, flight, [동사] flee, bolt, escape, run[get] away (from), take (to) flight, make a getaway, (formal) fly
nighttime getaway[escape], run away under the cover of darkness, (Brit) do a moonlight (flit)
give police the slip and flee

vlive.korean: 약간... - 캐리어 같은 거 끌고 있거든 - 도주를 하려나? It's... - Luggage. - Are they running away? 듣기 View video GFRIEND : 월요일밤 여친과 함께👍
vlive.english: It's... - Luggage. - Are they running away?

vlive.korean: 이거 보고 또 수면 도주 방송... - 나가야지 - 어딜 나가요? People feel awake while watching us. - And they go out. - To where? 듣기 View video V COOKIE : [Full] April X LieV - 에이프릴의 눕방라이브!
vlive.english: People feel awake while watching us. - And they go out. - To where?

vlive.korean: 도주 우려가 있어서. - 도주? This is concerning a runaway. - A runaway? 듣기 View video V WEB DRAMA : 텔레씨네 <아이리시어퍼컷> 8회
vlive.english: This is concerning a runaway. - A runaway?

vlive.korean: 지금 도주하는 나현이. Na Hyun is running off. 듣기 View video SONAMOO : 꽃보다소나무 (광안리 넘나 좋은 것)
[셔누 2차 도주] 나 못 보겠어. [Shownu's 2nd runaway] I can't see. 듣기 View video MONSTA X : MONSTA X-RAY2 (몬스타엑스레이2)_6화
